articles.author: Pratik Bhakta
articles.title: [YS Exclusive] HDB Financial Services customer data leaked online - YourStory
articles.description: In a major cyber attack, 30 GB of customer data from HDB Financial Services, the non-banking lending arm of HDFC Bank, has been leaked on a hacker portal. Details pertaining to consumer durable and two-wheeler loans have been released.
articles.content: In a major case of cyber attack and data breach, almost 30 GB of customer data belonging to HDB Financial Services, the non-banking lending arm of HDFC Bank, was leaked online on a hacker forum on Ma… [+3609 chars]
